intro: Royena ramulosa, commonly known as the slender-leafed rosenia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its delicate, narrow leaves and clusters of small, fragrant white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
